top_stories.title: The circular money problem at the heart of AI’s biggest deals
top_stories.description: SoftBank and OpenAI announced a new 50-50 joint venture this week to sell enterprise AI tools in Japan under the brand “Crystal Intelligence.” On paper, it’s a straightforward international expansion deal. But SoftBank’s role as a major investor in OpenAI is raising questions about whether AI’s biggest deals are creating real economic value or just moving money in circles. […]
top_stories.author: Theresa Loconsolo
top_stories.content: SoftBank and OpenAI announced a new 50-50 joint venture this week to sell enterprise AI tools in Japan under the brand “Crystal Intelligence.” On paper, it’s a straightforward international expansion deal. But SoftBank’s role as a major investor in OpenAI is raising questions about whether AI’s biggest deals are creating real economic value or just moving money in circles. […]

top_stories.title: Enhancing software supply chain security with Microsoft’s Signing Transparency
top_stories.description: Microsoft is announcing the preview of Signing Transparency to address software supply chain threats that traditional code signing alone cannot fully prevent, building on the Zero Trust principle of “never trust, always verify.” Signing Transparency uses an append-only log to verifiably record each signature, with keys protected in a secure confidential computing enclave. The post Enhancing software supply chain security with Microsoft’s Signing Transparency appeared first on Microsoft Azure...
top_stories.author: Mark Russinovich
top_stories.content: Microsoft is announcing the preview of Signing Transparency to address software supply chain threats that traditional code signing alone cannot fully prevent, building on the Zero Trust principle of “never trust, always verify.” Signing Transparency uses an append-only log to verifiably record each signature, with keys protected in a secure confidential computing enclave. The post Enhancing software supply chain security with Microsoft’s Signing Transparency appeared first on Microsoft Azure...

top_stories.title: Introducing Amazon Bedrock cross-Region inference for Claude Sonnet 4.5 and Haiku 4.5 in Japan and Australia
top_stories.description: こんにちは, G’day. The recent launch of Anthropic’s Claude Sonnet 4.5 and Claude Haiku 4.5, now available on Amazon Bedrock, marks a significant leap forward in generative AI models. These state-of-the-art models excel at complex agentic tasks, coding, and enterprise workloads, offering enhanced capabilities to developers. Along with the new models, we are thrilled to announce that […]

top_stories.title: AWS and OpenAI announce multi-year strategic partnership
top_stories.description: OpenAI and AWS have entered a multi-year, $38 billion partnership to scale advanced AI workloads. AWS will provide world-class infrastructure and compute capacity to power OpenAI’s next generation of models.
top_stories.content: OpenAI and AWS have entered a multi-year, $38 billion partnership to scale advanced AI workloads. AWS will provide world-class infrastructure and compute capacity to power OpenAI’s next generation of models.

top_stories.title: Capitalism Built OpenAI, Constraints Helped China Defeat It
top_stories.description: The estimated cost of developing the Kimi K2 Thinking AI model was around $4.6 million. The post Capitalism Built OpenAI, Constraints Helped China Defeat It appeared first on Analytics India Magazine.
top_stories.author: Siddharth Jindal
